animeDescription: An anime adaptation of the erotic manga "Ikenai Boy" by Yoshihiro Suma, serialized in Business Jump.Our hero is the typical young energetic college boy, but he got a special gift. He has "magic hands" that puts all women in ecstasy. Obviously he is taking advantage of this gift by meeting one bishoujo after the other! (Source: MU)
animeRelated: ['Sequel: Ikenai Boy: Ikasu Maruhi Hand Power']
